products.title: Genesis Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Genesis Blackout range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. 
 
This grey roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric so will help to keep the light out of rooms when you want to keep them dark. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1777 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Polyester Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A grey electric roller blind easily updates the space,  and our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.   This light grey blackout roller has a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter,  a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.  Why not pair with our Smart Hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with Amazon Alexa or Google Home Hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This grey electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2139 Fabric Colour: Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Silver UV-Reflecting Thermal Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Isla PVC Blackout Marina Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Isla PVC Blackout Marina Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Smart and timeless, Isla PVC Blackout Marina Grey electric roller blind gives you an air of refined sophistication wherever you choose to feature it.  With a double-sided pattern consisting of gently curving leaves in a variety of different sizes, it provides a subtle focal point in your room of choice.  The Isla Marina uses a special blackout material, ideal for shutting out the daylight when you need to and it’s flame retardant for extra safety. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Stone Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Stone Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
When you want something decidedly neutral and contemporary, this handsome design will work perfectly. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle décor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice. A high-quality finish that is flame retardant; Boheme PVC Blackout Stone Grey electric roller blinds are crafted out of a special blackout fabric so light won’t travel into your room when closed. Perfect to aid a restful nights sleep. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.productdescription:
For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, Whitby Blackout PVC Stone Grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. With a blackout fabric and a flame-retardant finish, it’s a great choice and the electric operation means it’s so easy to open and close. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.

products.productdescription:
Loras Blackout Melody Grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice.  With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button.  Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches it’s a serene design that will gain many compliments.  This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Electric Roller Blind in Grey/Pink. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This stylish Japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with Pollergen™, a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
